game.name: Make Magic Great Again
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A Roguelike survivor-style action game of elemental mastery. Harness eight core elements, survive endless demon hordes, and join up to 4 players in co-op to unleash ancient formulas—embark on an epic journey to revive the lost glory of magic!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A Roguelike survivor-style action game of elemental mastery. Harness eight core elements, survive endless demon hordes, and join up to 4 players in co-op to unleash ancient formulas—embark on an epic journey to revive the lost glory of magic!
